title: Ticket #6996: Add "Provides: blahp" to the CHTC RPM
description:
The CHTC condor RPMs contain the blahp externals that are required by HTCondor-CE. The HTCondor packaging doesn't "Provide: blahp", though so the HTCondor-CE packaging in the CHTC "Requires: /usr/libexec/condor/glite/bin/batch_gahp" instead (https://github.com/opensciencegrid/htcondor-ce/blob/master/rpm/htcondor-ce.spec#L107-L111).

This works fine if they get HTCondor/HTCondor-CE from the same Yum repository but if they want the CHTC HTCondor and the OSG HTCondor-CE, they'll run into issues.
remarks:

code review:

This looks fine to me.

I was wondering if perhaps we'd want to include the version of the blahp (1.16.5.1) in there too, rather than make a versionless provides, but Brian Lin confirmed that all we care about is that it satisfies the blahp requirement, so it's fine as is.

In the future that blahp will be handled differently.

No documentation until the other side changes.
